summary:
## Medal of Honor: America's Highest Military Honor

The Medal of Honor is the most prestigious award given to U.S. military members for extreme bravery in combat. It's presented by the President and approved by Congress. There are three types: for the Army, Navy (including Marines and Coast Guard), and Air Force (including Guardians). 

First awarded in 1861, over 3,500 Medals of Honor have been given out, mostly for actions during the Civil War.  It's considered the oldest and most respected combat decoration in the U.S. Armed Forces.
title: Medal of Honor
